貽人口實.definition: to make oneself an object of ridicule

貽燕.definition: to leave peace for the future generations

貽笑.definition: to be ridiculous; to make a fool of oneself

貽笑大方.definition: to make a fool of oneself; to make oneself a laughing stock

貽笑方家.definition: a novice making a fool of himself; to make oneself ridiculous before experts

貽範古今.definition: to leave an example for all generations

貽誤.definition: to affect adversely; to delay or hinder; to waste (an opportunity); to mislead
